events.message: I received my order yesterday, but I want to request a refund because the product does not meet my expectations.
The case was identified as a refund request based on the customer's message indicating dissatisfaction and desire to return the product.
Customer support agent John Smith was assigned to handle the refund request for this order.
Hello! I’m John from support. I understand you want to request a refund. I’m here to help you with that.
Could you please provide the order number and the reason for the refund so we can process your request promptly?
The order number is 123456789. I want a refund because the item is not as described and I do not need it.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate the refund process once you return the product. I will send you the instructions shortly.
Thanks for the quick reply. I appreciate the clear instructions and will follow up with the return shipment.
We have processed your refund successfully after receiving the returned item. The amount should appear on your account shortly.
Just checking in to ensure you received the refund and that everything is satisfactory with our service. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
As there have been no further issues reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support.
We would appreciate if you could take a moment to complete a short survey about your experience with our refund process.
